abstract: Marks the control template as containing sensitive, private user data.

declaration.code: @MainActor @preconcurrency func privacySensitive(_ sensitive: Bool = true) -> some ControlWidgetTemplate

overview:
## Discussion

The system redacts controls marked with this modifier when those controls are displayed on the Lock Screen and the device is locked.

Controls also respect the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/privacySensitive(_:)] modifier applied to the control’s label. That modifier only redacts the control content, however. To redact the content *and* the state of the control, apply this modifier to the control template:
title: privacySensitive(_:)
